documents.document: After a couple of hearts related posts this morning I need to cleanse myself, this should do it https://t.co/g0wYRdbV8F

Yuk another company saying "we are pitting the customer at the heart of what we do" @Tesco @BBCr4today #emptywords
The older I get the worse #bbcqt seems to get. A panel of people talking but saying nothing .... Time for bed 😴💤💤
Just watched last nights highlights........think this sums it up https://t.co/lNOqeRaCvP

I have finished my Russian Caravan.
Real tea drinkers know what's going on.........
"Let's be more dog and start wagging our own tail" #corporatespeak

@shylav_shyla really worth listening. It's people's real stories around the song and what it means to them.
